org.apache.coyote.http11

接口 OutputFilter

  • 所有超级接口:
    HttpOutputBuffer, OutputBuffer
    所有已知实现类:
    ChunkedOutputFilter, GzipOutputFilter, IdentityOutputFilter, VoidOutputFilter

    public interface OutputFilter
extends HttpOutputBuffer
    Output filter.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void recycle()
      Make the filter ready to process the next request.
      void setBuffer(HttpOutputBuffer buffer)
      Set the next buffer in the filter pipeline.
      void setResponse(Response response)
      Some filters need additional parameters from the response.

      • 从接口继承的方法 org.apache.coyote.http11.HttpOutputBuffer

        end, flush

      • 从接口继承的方法 org.apache.coyote.OutputBuffer

        doWrite, doWrite, getBytesWritten

    • 方法详细资料

      • setResponse

        void setResponse(Response response)
        Some filters need additional parameters from the response. All the necessary reading can occur in that method, as this method is called after the response header processing is complete.
        参数:
        response - The response to associate with this OutputFilter

      • recycle

        void recycle()
        Make the filter ready to process the next request.

      • setBuffer

        void setBuffer(HttpOutputBuffer buffer)
        Set the next buffer in the filter pipeline.
        参数:
        buffer - The next buffer instance
